scripts.delete-git-tag: git tag -d v$npm_package_version && git push origin :v$npm_package_version
scripts.zip: npm ls --prod --parseable | grep node_modules | sed -e 's/.*node_modules/node_modules/' | xargs zip embed.zip -r src package.json index.js
scripts.deploy: npm run zip && wsk action update embed embed.zip --kind nodejs:10 --web raw --web-secure false -p api http://iframe.ly/api/oembed -p api '' -p UNSPLASH_AUTH $UNSPLASH_AUTH
scripts.deploy-iframely: npm run zip && wsk action update embed embed.zip --kind nodejs:10 --web raw --web-secure false -p api http://iframe.ly/api/oembed -p api_key insert-here
scripts.deploy-embedly: npm run zip && wsk action update embed embed.zip --kind nodejs:10 --web raw --web-secure false -p api https://api.embedly.com/1/oembed -p key insert-here
